title: Add method for fast creation of communities on status-go side
body:
# Feature Issue

As the community creation flow from mobile is out of scope for now, it is required to find a quick way to test the community functionality without a desktop, but with the predefined data for automation needs.

### User Story
As a QA automation, I need to have buttons in UI to quickly open 3 types of communities in e2e builds in order to speed up automation testing.

### Description

1) Closed community
`name`: closed community
`description`: closed community to check membership requests
`logo`: any 
`banner`: any
`colour`: #887af9 
`community history service` enabled: yes
`request to join required` : yes
`any member can pin a message`: yes

2) Open community
`name`: open community
`description`: open community to join with no requests
`logo`: any
`banner`: any
`colour`: #26a69a
`community history service` enabled: yes
`request to join required` :
`any member can pin a message`: no

3) Token-gated community
`name`: SNT community
`description`: require 10 SNT Goerli to use
`logo`: any 
`banner`: any
`colour`: #eab700
`community history service` enabled: yes
`request to join required`: yes
`any member can pin a message`:  no
`PERMISSIONS`: 10 STT on Goerli network to become a member 


### Acceptance Criteria
3 buttons on e2e and PR builds are available for creation 3 types of mentioned above communities.



### Notes

[comment]: # (For the developer who will implement. Include planning poker estimates, guidance, etc.)
